message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. We can always renegotiate later if you're not happy.
I think 40% for me is a more reasonable starting point, considering I'm taking the risk of inflation.
I'm willing to compromise, but 60/40 is too much in your favor.  Let's meet in the middle at 70/30.  Remember, your share is worth less with each passing round.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve more than 30%. Let's try 35% for me. I'm aware of the inflation risk, but I'm hoping we can reach a mutually acceptable agreement soon.
